text: Avoid the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-700J 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-700J 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The trackpad has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-700J 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop since day one. blue screens occasionally and the port selection feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
